医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
妇女健康倡议继续提供丰富的营养见解妇女健康倡议 (WHI) 是一项针对 161,808 名绝经后妇女的里程碑式研究，已持续 40 多年，继续为营养科学的进步贡献丰富的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/The-Womens-Health-Initiative-continues-to-provide-a-wealth-of-nutrition-insights.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/The-Womens-Health-Initiative-continues-to-provide-a-wealth-of-nutrition-insights.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53282f0a-d69b-4fc8-bce6-6c63b7131430 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 15:16:00 -0400 The Women's Health Initiative continues to provide a wealth of nutrition insights
内分泌学会和 Keystone 研讨会将主办推进内分泌研究的会议内分泌学会是一个促进内分泌学研究和临床实践的全球组织，而 Keystone Symposia 是一个关于一系列生命科学和生物医学主题的会议和研讨会的非营利组织，它们将联合主办一系列三场会议，以推进内分泌研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Endocrine-Society-and-Keystone-Symposia-to-host-conferences-for-advancing-endocrine-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Endocrine-Society-and-Keystone-Symposia-to-host-conferences-for-advancing-endocrine-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84740b37-1bea-4486-afcc-836fb78ae431 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 15:09:00 -0400 Endocrine Society and Keystone Symposia to host conferences for advancing endocrine research
DNA条形码揭示隐藏的物种多样性就物种而言，地球是一个几乎难以想象的多样化星球。研究人员已经识别出两到三百万个物种，但还有更多我们一无所知。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/DNA-barcoding-reveals-hidden-species-diversity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/DNA-barcoding-reveals-hidden-species-diversity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0463132-ed9f-49ab-abfd-eb028349b401 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 15:00:00 -0400 DNA barcoding reveals hidden species diversity
通过肠道微生物组洞察彻底改变精准营养罗格斯大学新不伦瑞克分校的研究人员与国际合作者一起推出了一种新方法，用于识别人类中常见且对健康至关重要的一组关键肠道微生物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Revolutionizing- precision-nutrition-with-gut-microbiome-insights.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Revolutionizing- precision-nutrition-with-gut-microbiome-insights.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75797870-c5dd-402c-929e-33effe3aa6b8 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 14:53:00 -0400 Revolutionizing precision nutrition with gut microbiome insights
术前营养计划促进患者康复根据在加利福尼亚州旧金山举行的 2024 年美国外科医生学会 (ACS) 临床大会上发表的一项新研究，全系统范围内的术前营养计划可以改善患者的治疗效果，并为医疗保健系统提供大幅节省成本的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Preoperative-nutrition-program-enhances-病人-recovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Preoperative-nutrition-program-enhances-病人-recovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=106374a7-a53a-46c2-8ab7-f0da9954c762 Fri, 18 Oct 2024 14:44:00 -0400 Preoperative nutrition program enhances patient recovery
肝功能的发现可能会彻底改变心血管疾病的治疗关于肝脏如何清除体内胆固醇的一项新发现可能会为心血管疾病（全球主要死亡原因）提供更有效的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Liver-function-discovery-could-revolutionize-treatments-for-cardioangio-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Liver-function-discovery-could-revolutionize-treatments-for-cardioangio-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b0ea60d-0935-4c99-82d7-cdb129a88f8c Fri, 18 Oct 2024 14:36:00 -0400 Liver function discovery could revolutionize treatments for cardiovascular disease
减肥药物和手术相结合的成本效益根据在加利福尼亚州旧金山举行的 2024 年美国外科医生学会 (ACS) 临床大会上发表的一项研究，从长远来看，新型减肥药物只有与减肥手术相结合才具有成本效益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Cost-effectness-of-combining-weight-loss-drugs-and-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Cost-effectness-of-combining-weight-loss-drugs-and-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9d9b0462-293a-4896-a2ad-de1c3602f21f Fri, 18 Oct 2024 14:28:00 -0400 Cost-effectiveness of combining weight loss drugs and surgery
研究揭示癌症幸存者的经济影响癌症的诊断不仅会损害一个人的健康。波士顿贝斯以色列女执事医疗中心和哈佛医学院的研究人员发现，在癌症诊断数年后，癌症患者及其家人可能会面临破产、信用评分降低和其他形式的财务挑战等财务后果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Studies-reveal-the-financial-fallout-of-cancer-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Studies-reveal-the-financial-fallout-of-cancer-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca31ddd3-33a6-4a6b-8448-aa9d496b9b4e Fri, 18 Oct 2024 14:20:00 -0400 Studies reveal the financial fallout of cancer survivors
研究人员制定策略来识别肠道激素分泌的调节因子由 Hubrecht 研究所和罗氏人类生物学研究所领导的一个多机构研究小组已经制定了识别肠道激素分泌调节剂的策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Researchers-develop-strategies-to-identify-regulators-of-intestinal-hormone-secretion.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Researchers-develop-strategies-to-identify-regulators-of-intestinal-hormone-secretion.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ec4dd9f-e8e4-4941-9f59-31a42527b20a Fri, 18 Oct 2024 14:13:43 -0400 Researchers develop strategies to identify regulators of intestinal hormone secretion
Waymark 的创新方法可改善医疗补助患者的健康结果Waymark 是一家致力于改善医疗补助医疗服务的获取和质量的公益公司，今天在《新英格兰医学杂志》(NEJM) Catalyst 上发表了一项同行评审研究，评估其早期干预模式在服务第一年的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Innovative-approach-by-Waymark-enhances-health-outcomes-for-Medicaid-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241018/Innovative-approach-by-Waymark-enhances-health-outcomes-for-Medicaid-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e7c0e2a-2c68-44ca-b503-7d610bff8e2f Fri, 18 Oct 2024 13:17:21 -0400 Innovative approach by Waymark enhances health outcomes for Medicaid patients
